items.name: Water
items.description: Fresh, filtered water. Definitely not from the tap, or from the dishwasher hose.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: Hot, black coffee. Cream and sugar available on request.

items.name: Iced Coffee
items.description: Iced cold-brew coffee. Cream and sugar available on request.

items.name: Bottomless Chips and Salsa
items.description: Get some chips and some salsa. As much as you want. Fuck it.

items.name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
items.description: Dip made with spinach and artichoke. We're not sure what an "artichoke" is but it's probably good.

items.name: Fried Pickles
items.description: Cucumbers, pickled in vinegar, battered and fried. You'll have it all to yourself because no one else will want any.

items.name: The Void
items.description: Please delete this, it's not professional. Weg. I mean it.
